subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
Budgets and Budgeting
Executive Compensation
Executives and Management
Bonuses
organizations: United States Ski and Snowboard Assn
lead_paragraph: Behind the celebrations of the U.S. Ski and Snowboard Association’s success at the Vancouver Olympics, discontent is simmering among athletes about the organization’s budget cuts and high pay to top executives.
snippet: Behind the celebrations of the U.S. Ski and Snowboard Association’s success at the Vancouver Olympics, discontent is simmering among athletes about the organization’s budget cuts and high pay to top executives.
